title: Save up to 20% from the Samsung Galaxy Watch FE’s Price!
description: Grab the Galaxy Watch FE with this online offer! The post Save up to 20% from the Samsung Galaxy Watch FE’s Price! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Grab the Galaxy Watch FE with this online offer!
text: Samsung’s expertise in designing and producing some of the most impressive tech on the market not only lies with its smartphones, but with home electronics, audio, and wearables as well. Speaking of wearables, the affordable Galaxy Watch FE is currently on sale right now with this deal that brings down its price by as much 20% off. In terms of hardware, the Galaxy Watch FE is available in black, pink gold and silver, with an aluminum case that wraps around a 1.2-inch Super AMOLED touch display. As with most Wear OS devices, it also comes with 5ATM + IP68 certification for added water resistance. The device comes with Samsung’s own Exynos W920 chip, alongside 1.5GB RAM and 16GB of storage for apps. The Galaxy Watch FE also has a wealth of sensors onboard, which include a Samsung BioActive Sensor (Optical Heart Rate + Electrical Heart + Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis), Accelerometer, Barometer, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, and a Light Sensor. You can check out the deal below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:

In terms of hardware, the Galaxy Watch FE is available in black, pink gold and silver, with an aluminum case that wraps around a 1.2-inch Super AMOLED touch display. As with most Wear OS devices, it also comes with 5ATM + IP68 certification for added water resistance. The device comes with Samsung’s own Exynos W920 chip, alongside 1.5GB RAM and 16GB of storage for apps.

The Galaxy Watch FE also has a wealth of sensors onboard, which include a Samsung BioActive Sensor (Optical Heart Rate + Electrical Heart + Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis), Accelerometer, Barometer, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, and a Light Sensor. You can check out the deal below.
